Package core

Class DiscardPile

java.lang.Object
core.DiscardPile
public class DiscardPile
extends java.lang.Object
Class implementing the discard pile, where all drawn and discarded action cards are transferred.

Once the action card deck becomes empty, the cards in the discard pile are shuffled then transferred (or recycled) back to the action card deck to allow for the continuity of the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    DiscardPile()
    Creates a discard pile object

  • Constructor Details

    • DiscardPile

      public DiscardPile()
      Creates a discard pile object

      In particular, a discard pile object is initialized with the name "Action Card Discard Pile" and the initial capacity of the ArrayList containing the cards is set to 50 since there are 50 action cards.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the discard pile
      Returns:
      name of the discard pile

    • getCardNames

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCardNames()
      Returns an ArrayList of strings containing the names of the cards inside this discard pile
      Returns:
      ArrayList of strings containing the names of the cards inside this discard pile

    • getCurrNumCards

      public int getCurrNumCards()
      Returns the number of cards in this discard pile currently
      Returns:
      number of cards in this discard pile currently

    • add

      public void add​(Card c)
      Adds a card to this discard pile

      Every time an action card is drawn and discarded from the action card deck, this method is called to transfer the said card to this discard pile.

      Parameters:
      c - card added to this discard pile

    • returnCardsTo

      public void returnCardsTo​(Deck d)
      Shuffles all the cards inside this discard pile and transfers them back to their original deck

      Once the player tries to draw a card from an empty action card deck, this method is called to recycle the cards and allow the game to continue.

      Parameters:
      d - original deck to which the cards inside this discard pile will be transferred back

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this discard pile, which includes its name, the number of cards currently, and the string representations of the cards currently inside it

      In particular, the representation contains the following details:

      • Name of this discard pile
      • Number of cards currently
      • String representations of the cards currently inside it (the first card displayed is the most recent card added to this discard pile)
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      string representation of this discard pile, which includes its name, the number of cards initially and currently, and the string representations of the cards currently inside it
